_sText:
Project history: 
A1-A2 closed alpha test .
A3-fixed,optimalized,public release .
This is my first map ;)

Futures :
•	18 cells (36TT and 14CT spawns),
•	Pool,
•	Disco,
•	Basketball,
•	Football,
•	RandomRocketJumper,
•	Cage,
•	Heal,
•	Laser Quest,
•	CosmicFight,
•	ShooterRange,
•	SpecialTest,
•	Painter (Red,Blue,Normal),
•	Random flashbangs in cells.

And many other things …
Lots of fun guaranteed!

Please do not reupload,remake or decompile !
If you want help, PM me >.<

This map was made through several versions, it started as a small blueprint which I then decided to create.

The map is a well balanced map, there are two vents for the T's to secretly run away while there are plenty of CT areas to guard the T's
The map is currently being played on the Edgegamers Jailbreak server and is best suited for around 30 players.
There are 30 Ct Spawns and 40 T Spawns

**This map requires NOBLOCK as many of the games are in small areas and you could end up with t's stuck together**

Features
* Climb
* Disco
* Maze
* Games Area
* S4S
* Soccer Field
* Playground
* Pool
* Heal
* Couch Room
* Jump the Gorge
* Tower Climb

Special Features
* There is a 'party hat; at the end of the maze that uses custom textures and spritetrails,
* The Tower Climb and Jump the Gorge were personal ideas that i included which players seem to enjoy :]

Minor Bugs
* The custom textures can bug occasionly

Testers -

Phasexero
Roguesniper
Angeal
Lava
Enfiorce

Merci a L'ours Juif de m'avoir aidé.
Have fun!

This map has many small details that make this map so special. There is a large pool, a climb, 2 deagle roulette fields, a is secret room of the reach password only with a large armory with many different weapons, a garden with a small playground, and even a small pool in the large room where the cell blocks are. of course there are many other great things in this map but it looks you simply himself.there are plenty of escape routes so that the t's in good hands too escaped too. there are so many escape routes available which the map is well playable. Well, what remains for me to say ..

the map took a lot of work and I am very happy with it.

I made this map a couple months ago,this one isn't as good as my others,but it will have to do.

Welcome to corridor the prison to hold you forever!!!

Map Games!
==================
- 4 Square , Press the button to start a 10 second count down of death. A random side will be chose to be slain. If you are caught in the walls when they come up prepare to die... immediately.
- Obstacle Course , A fairly hard obby if you ask me prepare to die by a little trick placed ever so conveniently.
- Water Obstacle , There is no room for air here (no pun intended) go as fast as possible or die trying.
- Toilet game , Press the button and 3.2 seconds later some john will surely die!
- Couch game , You better leave your friends behind and start dancing now because once a couch is chosen they wont be dancing for long!
- C4 Toss , who needs admins for a simple game. Go by distance or 3 shots sum of how many lines they cross and let the cts decide what the fate is of the rest!

Secrets! (i won't say exactly but i will give you hints!!!)
------------------
- Health smoke(look up)
- Speed + Gravity(A science experiment gone wrong!!!)
- SG dak dak with over 9000 bullets(It'll be swimingly to find this one.)
- Trail smoke(The path will kill ya!)

The Map


This map is loosely based off of electric_large and razor_v2 in layout but other than that it is an original map. In it you will find a well stocked armory containing AKs, M4A1s, some AWPs, FAMASes, Scouts, and M3s, along with a complimentary set of pistols.

There is a medium number of cells 10 regular, 2 vip and 1 solitary. With 18 T spawns and 18 CT spawns. The map contains the typical "big cage", a pool/showers, a shot for shot arena, a kitchen, a medic, a sauna, garage, soccer, and a knife fighting arena, along with many secrets.

The map has an overall cold type of feel, characterized by low-key lighting, cold florescent lighting and warm but uninviting incandescent lighting. Though the screenshots and the actual map convey more than I can put into words.

This map is ©Copyright Chartreuse 2010, while I put no protections against decompiling the map I do have to say that you should only do it to learn about mapping and not to take from the map. This map may not be decompiled with the intent to copy parts from the map. You may not take any parts from this map and use them in any other map without my express permission.

_sText:
**Ba_Jail_Cavewalk_v1b is now up! Feel free to download it**

**The old version can be found [here](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/160178 "Ba_Jail_Cavewalk_pb").**

Cavewalk_v2 is under development! It features larger, yet more simple layout for better game play. You can follow the progress [here](http://gamebanana.com/wips/44618 "Ba_Jail_Cavewalk_v2 - WIP").

-----------------------------------------------------------

My latest jailbreak map. This version is drastically different from the first pre-beta release. Almost all areas have been redesigned to meet the standards of modern jailbreak maps. 

This map started out as a spare time project and ended up as fully functional jailbreak map. Theme of the map is an old underground mining, that has been transformed into a prison for the most dangerous inmates ever.

This version of Cavewalk features a completely new layout, which is much more simple compared to the old one. Every tunnel is quite well lit and a lot wider than before. Many secrets still remain for players to explore. 

<legend>Map features...</legend>

- Armory
- 12 Cells with 4 spawns each (Except vent cell which has 2)
- Large cell area with many places for prisoners to go to
- Medic with two healing beds
- Jump Rope (With Start-Stop function)
- Hot potato 
- Dodgeball (With Start-Stop function)
- Colors (With Start-Stop function)
- Climb that changes every round (3 different ones)
- Watch your Head! (With Start-Stop function)
- Vents leading to various places
- Breakable fence that lets you to armory trough a vent
- Hidden guns (Psst! There's a few bodies around the map with glocks...)
- Underground mining theme with random ambient sounds and ground shake
- Random weapon system which spawns a set of random weapons in certain cells
- Hidden flashbangs that have some effects on them
- Some melons you can drop on prioners!


The map itself is medium size, with no useless areas. All games are labeled and there's signs in the tunnels that guide players to them. FPS should be quite high regardless of the position. If you however suffer from low fps, I suggest you to tweak your graphics settings. Bear in mind that disabling HDR will result in a darker atmosphere.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Feedback is much appreciated, as always. I do ask you to spend some time testing the map and writing the feedback as it helps me the most. If you decide to rate the map I'd to like hear why you did/didn't like it. Any low ratings without justification will be removed.

Thanks for downloading this map. If you have any questions, suggestions or such feel free to share them with me!

**The new version can be found [here](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/185153 "Ba_Jail_Cavewalk_v1b").**

My newest jailbreak map. Currently as prebeta, since I'd like to have some more feedback of the map before I start developing next version. This version is playable, but It may contain some major or minor bugs that might effect game play.

Started out as a misc project and ended up as fully functional jailbreak map. Map's theme is an old underground mining, that has been transformed into a prison for the baddest inmates ever. 

Cavewalk has many areas and secrets (+30) for you to explore. Some of them are pretty much little Easter Eggs, but some are bit bigger and harder to find. Also to keep the game play fun, I've added some different effects and minigames. 
<legend>Map's content</legend>

- Armory, 12 CT spawns, lots of weapons
- Cellblock, 8 Cells / 24 T spawns, 2 secrets in cells
- Mainhall, Control room, 2 secrets
- Medic
- Cafeteria
- Minigames: Climb

Map itself is kind a big and the layout might be complex in players' opinion, but as you play it, you'll learn it. FPS was hard to keep around 60, because the huge amount of details. The map is optimized to it's best, so if you have low fps (below 30) around the map, I suggest adjusting your graphic settings to lower values.

Feedback is much appreciated, as always. But I ask you to really spend some time testing the map and writing the feedback. If you rate the map, I want to hear why did you like/not like it. All ratings without justification will be removed. 

Thank you. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

Heyyy Guys !

Christy asked me to edit his map "ba_jail_canyon", so i did it :)

**Original Map:**

- Cells

- Minigame (CouchRoom, Race)

- Climb

- Disco

- Pool

- Foot

- Lr Room

- Boat Game


What is new now ?

- New Lighting

- Custom texture

- Custom models

- Custom music


I hope you'll play it at Halloween, have fun :)

**THIS VERSION WORKS FINE! FEEL FREE TO UPLOAD TO YOUR SERVER!**

**CS GO version can be found [here](http://csgo.gamebanana.com/maps/182680 "Ba_Jail_Canyondam_GO").**

Newest version of Canyondam! And hopefully final.

**Map's content**

- Armory: 15 CT spawns
- Cellblock: 6 big cells and 12 little cells / in total 48 spawns, 3 secrets in cells
- Mainhall: 3 minigames, access to dam tunnels and some tables
- Medic
- Waterpolo, showers
- Minigames: Choose Your Couch, Box Race, Sky Race, Shoot 'Em Up, Boat Wars and Dodgeball!
- Basketball
- Theater
- Dam tunnels: 2 new exits, control room and secrets

**What got changed?**

- Removed Disco due to high number of entities it had
- Removed Pool due to lack of use
- Removed Cafeteria due to lack of use/details
- Removed Hot Potato and some other minigames due to high entity data
- Changed most of the textures to Black Mesa's ones
- Relocated Theater and Dodgeball
- Fixed some gameplay issues 
- Removed Super AWP

Even though the map is large in comparison with other jailbreak maps out there, It's still very easy to play on. All games have been labeled and even as a new player you'll learn the map quickly. 

In terms of optimization, I've done my best. If you get terribly low FPS while playing, I suggest you to disable HDR and tweak your graphic-settings. 

Feedback is much appreciated as always. I do ask you to spend some time testing the map and writing the feedback. If you decide to rate the map, I would like to hear why did/didn't you like it. Unjustified ratings may be deleted.

**Known bugs** 

- Entity caused lag-spikes (0-5 times per round)
- Some misaligned textures
- Wrong textures in some places
- High number of entities in certain areas

Those issues will be fixed at some point.

Thank you for downloading this map. If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to share them with me!

**Newer CSS version (v6) can be found [here](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/176331 "Ba_Jail_Canyondam_v6_Fix").**

This is my remake of Christy's ba_jail_canyon_v3.

The map contains 5 minigames, such as Box Race and Boat Wars.

Feel free to comment or upload to your server.

This map was made in about 6 weeks from start to finish. Everything from scratch. I didn't spend any extra time making the map look great. I think it looks good enough for playing and it plays well too. 

The map is tested with 18 players many times. It plays well, there's no major nor minor bugs that would affect game play.
